http.http_timeout: [HTTP Timeout] The HTTP request ran took too long to complete.
http.http_failed: [HTTP Failed] The HTTP request failed or was rejected.
http.http_invalid_response: [HTTP Invalid Response] The response from the server did not result in the expected response type.
http.invalid_socket_type: [Invalid Socket Type] Unable to determine the socket type (client / server) or the engine (node / browser).
http.generic_socket_error: [Generic Socket Error] There was an error with the web socket connection.
http.invalid_websocket_request: [Invalid WebSocket Request] The web socket request did not meet the requirements.
http.payload_exceeds_max_size: [Payload Exceeds Max Size] The payload length exceeds the maximum size for a single socket frame; ensure fragmentation has been configured.
